DOC.brief_summary: To determine Maximum Tolerated Dose ( MTD ) , tolerability , initial safety profile CMC-544 subject B-cell Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma ( NHL ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating CMC-544 In B-Cell Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Subjects previously diagnose CD22positive , Bcell NHL , accord WHO classification , progress least 2 prior therapy probable clinical benefit At expanded cohort , part 2 study , subject must one following : Follicular lymphoma previously treat least one dose rituximab , receive radioimmunotherapy Diffuse large Bcell lymphoma Age 18 year old Candidate potentially curative therapy opinion investigator Chronic lymphocytic leukemia Burkitt 's lymphoma , primary effusion lymphoma , precursor Bcell lymphoblastic lymphoma
